title: Environment update in Enugu: Clean Energy and Solar Pilots
body:
2025-12-26 â€” In Enugu, educators highlighted clean energy as schools adopt new methods to improve student outcomes.

Stakeholders emphasized inclusive access, noting that reliable infrastructure remains key for sustained progress.

Local officials in Enugu announced support for solar pilots, aiming to reach more families across the region.

Experts say solar installations is accelerating, with communities reporting practical benefits in everyday life.

Parents expressed optimism, while calling for continuous training and affordable devices.

Students and teachers welcomed the changes, citing improved engagement and better exam preparation.

The program will roll out in phases, with pilot initiatives scheduled over the next quarter.
